headline.main: SOLOMONS ATTACK MINIMIZED BY AXIS; Tokyo Dispatch Broadcast by Berlin Says We Seek Unoccupied or Weak Islands KEY ONES 'IMPREGNABLE' Japanese Assert They Sank 6 Warships and 3 Transports and Downed 77 Planes

lead_paragraph: Axis broadcasts, perhaps intended to cushion an announcement of the loss of further southwest Pacific territory by the Japanese, sought yesterday to minimize the importance of the United States offensive in the New Guinea-Solomons area.
snippet: Axis broadcasts, perhaps intended to cushion an announcement of the loss of further southwest Pacific territory by the Japanese, sought yesterday to minimize the importance of the United States offensive in the New Guinea-Solomons area....
